body.name: Molly's Suds Active Wear Laundry Detergent | Natural Extra Strength Laundry Powder, Stain Fighting for Performance Fabrics and Sensitive Skin | 120 Loads
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 56 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: EXTRA STRENGTH: Active Wear Detergent is formulated with active enzymes, baking soda and plant-based surfactants (powerful cleaning agents). Specially formulated to fight the sweatiest, smelliest odors and to extend the life of your favorite activewear, athleisure clothing and other high-tech fabrics.

SAFER INGREDIENTS: Our formula is safer for those with fragrance sensitivities, sensitive skin, babies, or other sensitivities. There are no harsh ingredients, synthetic fragrances, dyes, optical brighteners, chlorine, or fillers. The Active Wear Detergent is certified Cruelty-Free by Leaping Bunny.
EXTRA CONCENTRATED: This concentrated formula works in all water temperatures and is effective in both hard and soft water. This low sudsing formula is safe for standard and HE washing machines.

DESIGNED FOR PERFORMANCE FABRICS: Preserves high-tech features of your performance wear such as breathability, SPF and moisture wicking; safe for all brands like Adidas, Athleta, Lululemon, Nike, Outdoor Voices and more
WHAT’S INCLUDED: (1) 60 oz (120 load) bag of Active Wear Laundry Detergent with a 1 oz measuring scoop.

Are Molly's Suds products safe for sensitive skin? Yes! Many of our customers have sensitive skin or eczema and that is why they use all of our products. There are no harsh or leaching chemicals and each product is clean rinsing. Are your detergents HE-friendly? Yes! All of our detergents are safe for standard, HE, and commercial washing machines. Our powder detergents do best when you add it directly to your drum and then toss in your laundry. Are your detergents septic-safe? Are they grey water safe? All of our laundry and cleaning products are septic-safe. Our Original Laundry Powder is grey water-safe, we even had it soil tested! Are Molly's Suds products safe to use while pregnant and/or for my baby's clothing? All of our products are safe to use during pregnancy. Our laundry products are all safe for use on baby clothing. Many parents choose our unscented laundry products for newborns, however our scented options are safe to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean laundry soap for ranch/trucking clothes CLEAN!!!
reviews.reviewText: The Molly Suds soap has been a game changer for good clean soap that works, cleans the clothes, smells clean fresh scent or we like the citrus to and with a little bit of vinegar for fabric softener our clothes come out clean clean with no soap residue or build up. Wont use any other brand - highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes care of odors and cleans well
reviews.reviewText: I was looking to switch from a liquid detergent to a more eco-friendly alternative as well as one that has better ingredients for our skin/bodies. I purchased detergent sheets; however, after several months of usage, several shirts started smelling musky. Even though the product touted having enzymes, it wasn’t strong enough to clean the shirts well enough. After reading reviews, I took the chance and ordered this Molly’s Suds active wear detergent. I was glad it took care of the musky odors right away and, although I would have preferred a fragrance-free alternative, I am pleased with its performance and have been able to tolerate the scent.The only thing I wish is that the packaging/scooper be not made of plastic and be eco-friendlier. Regardless, it’s still a benefit overall because it’s much smaller than a bulky liquid detergent bottle and cap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So clean and fresh
reviews.reviewText: After trying a number of different brands, this is now my go-to for sensitive but effective detergent. Lifts stains and leaves my laundry smelling clean. I've found it hard to find a powder detergent that actually smells great but not perfumy. I mix this with the Mollys Suds Lavender scent for an extra good smelling load.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Less plastic, I can use as much as I want… I let all my clothes soak for at least 15 minutes. I have not needed to try any others at the moment! I usually wash on cold, I’m assuming it would be better with warmer water. I use defunkify and think this is a pretty good competitor..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes the stink out
reviews.reviewText: This active version of Mollys Suds works great even on the stinkiest of hockey stuff. So glad I found it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clothes Feel Clean and No Chemical Smell
reviews.reviewText: Clothes actually seem cleaner!! We have two athletic teen boys so you can image their practice clothes and uniforms!We use 2 scoops every time and so far the clothes feel, look and smell clean without flowery chemical smells. Both have sensitive skin and regular detergent was making them break out.We use the New Zealand dryer balls, add a few drops of essential, to round out the cleaning cycle.Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product smells very strong in package. But, smells very nice after wash and cleans better than my old detergent (Gain). And it’s nice to know I’m choosing a healthier choice for my family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not dissolve!
reviews.reviewText: This is the second bag of Molly’s suds laundry detergent we have bought. The first was lavender. The second was for activewear. We had no problems with the first bag. The second bag does not work. It does not dissolve in the washing machine tray. We have used both hot and cold water. I tried pre-mixing and then adding. It just does not dissolve, which leaves clumps of hard detergent. Manufacture was emailed and have not heard a response back. Very disappointing for a $25 bag of laundry detergent!
Nothing but clean! No residue, all I smell is wonderful, clean fabric. Will definitely buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn’t really help with the smell
reviews.reviewText: I have another purple one of the same brwnd and wanted to give it a go to the sporty one. But smell (even the perfume smell) doesnt go away let alone sweat…
All my clothes come out so clean. Washed my duvet the other day and it came out feeling like it did the day I bought it. I was shocked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Title read that it is sold as a two pack and therefore it 240 loads. It is indeed one pack so it was sent back and cannot actually comment on the use or quality of the product itself

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was so looking forward to using this after reading the reviews but my thoughts are as follows:- the smell is ok and I quite like it, you can definitely smell it when the washing is dry and it's quite detergent-y;- the powder seems great at removing dirt like mud from clothes;- it is awful at removing oil based food type stains from clothes;- given the above I now use it as a wash booster by adding one scoop to a wash where I'm using a laundry detergent sheet and that seems to be working well.
